bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Etiological Agent. identical with ting tan 停痰 , halting phlegm. Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 5: 治腎臟虛損，上 焦痰滯，多唾稠濁，腹脅脹滿，吃食微少，宜服赤茯苓丸方 , “To cure depletion harm in the kidney depot, phlegm sluggishness in the upper burner, with large quantities of thick and turbid saliva, distension and a feeling of fullness in the abdomen and flanks, as well as minimal ingestion of food, the recipe to ingest the pills with chi fu ling is advisable”.
